subject: Music
title: Music and Heart Rate
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Music and Heart Rate.

hook.text: Your heart doesn't just beat â€” it syncs to the music you're hearing.

buildup.text: Slow music around 60 BPM can lower heart rate and blood pressure within minutes.

discovery.text: The autonomic nervous system entrains to musical tempo without conscious effort.

twist.text: Surgeons who listen to music during operations have steadier hands and lower stress.

climax.text: Hospitals now prescribe music listening alongside medication for cardiac patients.

punchline.text: The right tempo can calm a racing heart.

quiz.question: How does slow music affect the body?
options: It can lower heart rate and blood pressure
